text:
USMAN AHMAD

Objective
Dynamic multi-lingual marking executive with over 3 1/2 years’ progressive experience 
within advertising and brand marketing. Possessing proven track record for 
orchestrating marketing strategies, opening new market segments. seeks a challenging 
and varied position that will enable me to capitalize on sound marketing, commercial 
and project management expertise, with opportunities for personal and professional 
growth.
